symbols.name: sap.ui.codeeditor.CodeEditor
symbols.description: Allows to visualize source code of various types with syntax highlighting, line numbers in editable and read only mode. Use this controls in scenarios where the user should be able to inspect and edit source code. NOTE: There is a known limitation where CodeEditor won't work within IconTabBar on Internet Explorer. There is a way to achieve the same functionality - an example of IconTabHeader and a CodeEditor can be found in the CodeEditor's samples.

properties.name: value
properties.description: The value displayed in the code editor

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of the code in the editor used for syntax highlighting Possible types are: abap, abc, actionscript, ada, apache_conf, applescript, asciidoc, assembly_x86, autohotkey, batchfile, bro, c9search, c_cpp, cirru, clojure, cobol, coffee, coldfusion, csharp, css, curly, d, dart, diff, django, dockerfile, dot, drools, eiffel, ejs, elixir, elm, erlang, forth, fortran, ftl, gcode, gherkin, gitignore, glsl, gobstones, golang, groovy, haml, handlebars, haskell, haskell_cabal, haxe, hjson, html, html_elixir, html_ruby, ini, io, jack, jade, java, javascript, json, jsoniq, jsp, jsx, julia, kotlin, latex, lean, less, liquid, lisp, live_script, livescript, logiql, lsl, lua, luapage, lucene, makefile, markdown, mask, matlab, mavens_mate_log, maze, mel, mips_assembler, mipsassembler, mushcode, mysql, nix, nsis, objectivec, ocaml, pascal, perl, pgsql, php, plain_text, powershell, praat, prolog, properties, protobuf, python, r, razor, rdoc, rhtml, rst, ruby, rust, sass, scad, scala, scheme, scss, sh, sjs, smarty, snippets, soy_template, space, sql, sqlserver, stylus, svg, swift, swig, tcl, tex, text, textile, toml, tsx, twig, typescript, vala, vbscript, velocity, verilog, vhdl, wollok, xml, xquery, yaml, terraform, slim, redshift, red, puppet, php_laravel_blade, mixal, jssm, fsharp, edifact, csp, cssound_score, cssound_orchestra, cssound_document,

properties.name: width
properties.description: The width of the code editor

properties.name: height
properties.description: The height of the code editor. A minimal height of 3rem will be applied in case the height is less than 20px.

properties.name: editable
properties.description: Sets whether the code in the editor can be changed by the user

properties.name: lineNumbers
properties.description: Sets whether line numbers should be shown

properties.name: valueSelection
properties.description: Sets whether the code is automatically selected if a value is set

properties.name: maxLines
properties.description: Sets whether the editor height should auto expand to a maximum number of lines. After reaching the maximum number of lines specified, the content of the CodeEditor will become scrollable. Note: Keep in mind that the auto expand CodeEditor behavior requires the height property to be set to auto.

properties.name: colorTheme
properties.description: Sets the editors color theme Possible values are: default, hcb, hcb_bright, hcb_blue, theme-ambiance, chaos, chrome, clouds, clouds_midnight, cobalt, crimson_editor, dawn, dreamweaver, eclipse, github, gob, gruvbox, idle_fingers, iplastic, katzenmilch, kr_theme, kuroir, merbivore, merbivore_soft, mono_industrial, monokai, pastel_on_dark, solarized_dark, solarized_light, sqlserver, terminal, textmate, tomorrow, tomorrow_night, tomorrow_night_blue, tomorrow_night_bright, tomorrow_night_eighties, twilight, dracula vibrant_ink, xcode

properties.name: syntaxHints
properties.description: Sets whether to show syntax hints the editor. This flag is only available if line numbers are shown.

parameters.name: sId
parameters.description: id for the new control, generated automatically if no id is given

parameters.name: mSettings
parameters.description: initial settings for the new control

constructor.description: Constructor for a new CodeEditor. Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

methods.name: _getEditorInstance
methods.description: Returns the internal ace editor instance

methods.name: addCustomCompleter

parameters.name: oCustomCompleter
parameters.description: Object with getCompletions method

methods.description: Defines custom completer - object implementing a getCompletions method. The method has two parameters - fnCallback method and context object. Context object provides details about oPos and sPrefix as provided by ACE.

methods.name: attachChange

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: oData
parameters.description: An application-specific payload object that will be passed to the event handler along with the event object when firing the event

parameters.name: fnFunction
parameters.description: The function to be called when the event occurs

parameters.name: oListener
parameters.description: Context object to call the event handler with. Defaults to this sap.ui.codeeditor.CodeEditor itself

methods.description: Attaches event handler fnFunction to the {@link #event:change change} event of this sap.ui.codeeditor.CodeEditor. When called, the context of the event handler (its this) will be bound to oListener if specified, otherwise it will be bound to this sap.ui.codeeditor.CodeEditor itself.

methods.name: attachLiveChange

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: oData
parameters.description: An application-specific payload object that will be passed to the event handler along with the event object when firing the event

parameters.name: fnFunction
parameters.description: The function to be called when the event occurs

parameters.name: oListener
parameters.description: Context object to call the event handler with. Defaults to this sap.ui.codeeditor.CodeEditor itself

methods.description: Attaches event handler fnFunction to the {@link #event:liveChange liveChange} event of this sap.ui.codeeditor.CodeEditor. When called, the context of the event handler (its this) will be bound to oListener if specified, otherwise it will be bound to this sap.ui.codeeditor.CodeEditor itself.

methods.name: detachChange

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: fnFunction
parameters.description: The function to be called, when the event occurs

parameters.name: oListener
parameters.description: Context object on which the given function had to be called

methods.description: Detaches event handler fnFunction from the {@link #event:change change} event of this sap.ui.codeeditor.CodeEditor. The passed function and listener object must match the ones used for event registration.

methods.name: detachLiveChange

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: fnFunction
parameters.description: The function to be called, when the event occurs

parameters.name: oListener
parameters.description: Context object on which the given function had to be called

methods.description: Detaches event handler fnFunction from the {@link #event:liveChange liveChange} event of this sap.ui.codeeditor.CodeEditor. The passed function and listener object must match the ones used for event registration.

methods.name: extend

parameters.name: sClassName
parameters.description: Name of the class being created

parameters.name: oClassInfo
parameters.description: Object literal with information about the class

parameters.name: FNMetaImpl
parameters.description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to sap.ui.core.ElementMetadata

methods.description: Creates a new subclass of class sap.ui.codeeditor.CodeEditor with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo. oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in {@link sap.ui.core.Control.extend}.

methods.name: fireChange

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: mParameters
parameters.description: Parameters to pass along with the event

methods.description: Fires event {@link #event:change change} to attached listeners.

methods.name: fireLiveChange

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: mParameters
parameters.description: Parameters to pass along with the event

methods.description: Fires event {@link #event:liveChange liveChange} to attached listeners.

methods.name: focus
methods.description: Sets the focus to the code editor

methods.name: getColorTheme
methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getColorTheme colorTheme}. Sets the editors color theme Possible values are: default, hcb, hcb_bright, hcb_blue, theme-ambiance, chaos, chrome, clouds, clouds_midnight, cobalt, crimson_editor, dawn, dreamweaver, eclipse, github, gob, gruvbox, idle_fingers, iplastic, katzenmilch, kr_theme, kuroir, merbivore, merbivore_soft, mono_industrial, monokai, pastel_on_dark, solarized_dark, solarized_light, sqlserver, terminal, textmate, tomorrow, tomorrow_night, tomorrow_night_blue, tomorrow_night_bright, tomorrow_night_eighties, twilight, dracula vibrant_ink, xcode Default value is default.

methods.name: getCurrentValue

returnValue.description: Returns the current value of the code editor

methods.description: Returns the current value of the code editor

methods.name: getEditable
methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getEditable editable}. Sets whether the code in the editor can be changed by the user Default value is true.

methods.name: getHeight
methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getHeight height}. The height of the code editor. A minimal height of 3rem will be applied in case the height is less than 20px. Default value is 100%.

methods.name: getLineNumbers
methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getLineNumbers lineNumbers}. Sets whether line numbers should be shown Default value is true.

methods.name: getMaxLines
methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getMaxLines maxLines}. Sets whether the editor height should auto expand to a maximum number of lines. After reaching the maximum number of lines specified, the content of the CodeEditor will become scrollable. Note: Keep in mind that the auto expand CodeEditor behavior requires the height property to be set to auto. Default value is 0.

methods.name: getMetadata
methods.description: Returns a metadata object for class sap.ui.codeeditor.CodeEditor.

methods.name: getSyntaxHints
methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getSyntaxHints syntaxHints}. Sets whether to show syntax hints the editor. This flag is only available if line numbers are shown. Default value is true.

methods.name: getType
methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getType type}. The type of the code in the editor used for syntax highlighting Possible types are: abap, abc, actionscript, ada, apache_conf, applescript, asciidoc, assembly_x86, autohotkey, batchfile, bro, c9search, c_cpp, cirru, clojure, cobol, coffee, coldfusion, csharp, css, curly, d, dart, diff, django, dockerfile, dot, drools, eiffel, ejs, elixir, elm, erlang, forth, fortran, ftl, gcode, gherkin, gitignore, glsl, gobstones, golang, groovy, haml, handlebars, haskell, haskell_cabal, haxe, hjson, html, html_elixir, html_ruby, ini, io, jack, jade, java, javascript, json, jsoniq, jsp, jsx, julia, kotlin, latex, lean, less, liquid, lisp, live_script, livescript, logiql, lsl, lua, luapage, lucene, makefile, markdown, mask, matlab, mavens_mate_log, maze, mel, mips_assembler, mipsassembler, mushcode, mysql, nix, nsis, objectivec, ocaml, pascal, perl, pgsql, php, plain_text, powershell, praat, prolog, properties, protobuf, python, r, razor, rdoc, rhtml, rst, ruby, rust, sass, scad, scala, scheme, scss, sh, sjs, smarty, snippets, soy_template, space, sql, sqlserver, stylus, svg, swift, swig, tcl, tex, text, textile, toml, tsx, twig, typescript, vala, vbscript, velocity, verilog, vhdl, wollok, xml, xquery, yaml, terraform, slim, redshift, red, puppet, php_laravel_blade, mixal, jssm, fsharp, edifact, csp, cssound_score, cssound_orchestra, cssound_document, Default value is javascript.

methods.name: getValue
methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getValue value}. The value displayed in the code editor Default value is empty string.

methods.name: getValueSelection
methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getValueSelection valueSelection}. Sets whether the code is automatically selected if a value is set Default value is false.

methods.name: getWidth
methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getWidth width}. The width of the code editor Default value is 100%.

methods.name: prettyPrint
methods.description: Pretty-prints the content of the editor

methods.name: setColorTheme

parameters.name: sTheme
parameters.description: See property documentation for accepted values

methods.description: Sets the color theme of the code editor

methods.name: setEditable

parameters.name: bValue
parameters.description: true to allow editing, otherwise false

methods.description: Sets whether the code editor is editable or not

methods.name: setHeight

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: sHeight
parameters.description: New value for property height

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getHeight height}. The height of the code editor. A minimal height of 3rem will be applied in case the height is less than 20px. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is 100%.

methods.name: setLineNumbers

parameters.name: bValue
parameters.description: true to show line numbers

methods.description: Sets whether line numbers should be shown or not

methods.name: setMaxLines

parameters.name: iMaxLines
parameters.description: Maximum number of lines the editor should display

methods.description: Sets maxLines property.

methods.name: setSyntaxHints

parameters.name: bShow
parameters.description: true(default) to show the syntax hints

methods.description: Sets whether syntax hints should be shown or not Hints are only visible if lineNumbers is set to true.

methods.name: setType

parameters.name: sType
parameters.description: javascript (default), html, xml, css

methods.description: Sets the type of the code editors value used for syntax highlighting

methods.name: setValue

parameters.name: sValue
parameters.description: the value of the code editor

methods.description: Sets the value of the code editor

methods.name: setValueSelection

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: bValueSelection
parameters.description: New value for property valueSelection

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getValueSelection valueSelection}. Sets whether the code is automatically selected if a value is set When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is false.

methods.name: setVisible

parameters.name: bVisible
parameters.description: Whether the code editor is visible.

methods.description: Sets visible property.

methods.name: setWidth

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: sWidth
parameters.description: New value for property width

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getWidth width}. The width of the code editor When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is 100%.
